languages.text: "Я видела создание Атласа глазами Тисифоны, наблюдала за ним сквозь воспомниания клана Сеттала. Я... смогу создать ритуал, что оборвет нашу связь с эльдарским артефактом. И переселю предков Дома в мой Атлас — единственный, что останется Дому Орселлио и станет служить будущим новаторам. Собранная в Атласе мудрость предков поможет Дому встать на истинный путь. И позволит будущим поколениям избежать злосчастных ошибок прошлого".

traits.locale_text: "Я видела создание Атласа глазами Тисифоны, наблюдала за ним сквозь воспомниания клана Сеттала. Я... смогу создать ритуал, что оборвет нашу связь с эльдарским артефактом. И переселю предков Дома в мой Атлас — единственный, что останется Дому Орселлио и станет служить будущим новаторам. Собранная в Атласе мудрость предков поможет Дому встать на истинный путь. И позволит будущим поколениям избежать злосчастных ошибок прошлого".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

И позволит будущим поколениям избежать злосчастных ошибок прошлого".

languages.text: 「あたくしはティシフォンの視界を通じてアトラスの誕生に立ち会いました。セッタラ家の記憶で何度も経験した記憶です。あたくしは…アエルダリのアーティファクトと我々のつながりを断つ儀式を再構築できます。オーセリオ家の父祖をアトラスから動かします。アトラスはオーセリオ一族が未来のノベイターを出せるように管理する唯一のもの。アトラスに秘められた古代の英知はオーセリオ家を真実の道へと導き、後世の人々は先祖が落ちた悲惨な落とし穴を避けられるようになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしはティシフォンの視界を通じてアトラスの誕生に立ち会いました。セッタラ家の記憶で何度も経験した記憶です。あたくしは…アエルダリのアーティファクトと我々のつながりを断つ儀式を再構築できます。オーセリオ家の父祖をアトラスから動かします。アトラスはオーセリオ一族が未来のノベイターを出せるように管理する唯一のもの。アトラスに秘められた古代の英知はオーセリオ家を真実の道へと導き、後世の人々は先祖が落ちた悲惨な落とし穴を避けられるようになるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我通过提西福涅的眼睛，亲眼目睹了圣仪的诞生。通过塞塔拉氏族的记忆，我一次又一次地经历了这个过程。我……我可以重现当时的仪式，切断我们与艾达灵族造物之间的联系。我可以把家族祖先的灵魂转移到我的圣仪上，这台圣仪将会是奥赛罗家族唯一的圣仪，为未来的大族长服务。我们先祖的经验与智慧可以帮助奥赛罗家族走上真理之路，让后辈不再蹈先人的覆辙。”
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: “我通过提西福涅的眼睛，亲眼目睹了圣仪的诞生。通过塞塔拉氏族的记忆，我一次又一次地经历了这个过程。我……我可以重现当时的仪式，切断我们与艾达灵族造物之间的联系。我可以把家族祖先的灵魂转移到我的圣仪上，这台圣仪将会是奥塞罗家族唯一的圣仪，为未来的大族长服务。我们先祖的经验与智慧可以帮助奥塞罗家族走上真理之路，让后辈不再蹈先人的覆辙。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai été témoin de sa création à travers les yeux de Tisiphone. Je l'ai vécue à travers les souvenirs du clan Setthala. Je... peux créer un rituel qui rompra notre lien avec l'artefact aeldari et permettra à nos ancêtres d'intégrer mon Atlas, le seul qui restera en possession des Orsellio. Leur expérience et leur sagesse guideront notre maison sur la voie de la vérité et permettront aux générations futures de ne pas répéter les erreurs du passé. »
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été témoin de sa création à travers les yeux de Tisiphone. Je l'ai vécue à travers les souvenirs du clan Setthala. Je... peux créer un rituel qui rompra notre lien avec l'artefact aeldari et permettra à nos ancêtres d'intégrer mon Atlas, le seul qui restera en possession des Orsellio. Leur expérience et leur sagesse guideront notre maison sur la voie de la vérité et permettront aux générations futures de ne pas répéter les erreurs du passé. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «He sido testigo de la creación del Atlas a través de los ojos de Tisiphone. La he visto a través de los recuerdos del clan Setthala. Puedo... puedo crear un ritual para cortar nuestro vínculo con el artefacto Aeldari. Puedo transportar a los ancestros de mi casa a mi Atlas, el único que los Orsellio conservarán para sus futuros Novators. El saber ancestral del Atlas ayudará a guiar a la casa Orsellio por la senda de la verdad, para así evitar que las generaciones futuras cometan los catastróficos errores del pasado».
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: «He sido testigo de la creación del Atlas a través de los ojos de Tisiphone. La he visto a través de los recuerdos del clan Setthala. Puedo... puedo crear un ritual para cortar nuestro vínculo con el artefacto Aeldari. Puedo transportar a los ancestros de mi casa a mi Atlas, el único que los Orsellio conservarán para sus futuros Novators. El saber ancestral del Atlas ayudará a guiar a la casa Orsellio por la senda de la verdad, para así evitar que las generaciones futuras cometan los catastróficos errores del pasado».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe durch Tisiphones Augen gesehen, wie der Atlas entsteht. Ich habe es durch die Erinnerungen des Setthala-Clans erlebt. Ich ... kann ein Ritual abhalten, dass unsere Verbindung zu dem Aeldari-Artefakt durchtrennt. Ich kann die Ahnen des Hauses in meinen Atlas holen, den einzigen, den die Orsellios behalten werden, damit er zukünftigen Novatoren dienen kann. Die uralte Weisheit innerhalb des Atlas wird helfen, das Haus Orsellio auf den Pfad der Wahrheit zu führen. Und zukünftigen Generationen gestatten, die katastrophalen Fehler der Vergangenheit zu vermeiden."
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe durch Tisiphones Augen gesehen, wie der Atlas entsteht. Ich habe es durch die Erinnerungen des Setthala-Clans erlebt. Ich ... kann ein Ritual abhalten, dass unsere Verbindung zu dem Aeldari-Artefakt durchtrennt. Ich kann die Ahnen des Hauses in meinen Atlas holen, den einzigen, den die Orsellios behalten werden, damit er zukünftigen Novatoren dienen kann. Die uralte Weisheit innerhalb des Atlas wird helfen, das Haus Orsellio auf den Pfad der Wahrheit zu führen. Und zukünftigen Generationen gestatten, die katastrophalen Fehler der Vergangenheit zu vermeiden."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Atlas'ın yaratılışını Tisiphone'nin gözlerinden gördüm. Setthala klanının anılarında seyrettim. Aeldari eseriyle olan bağlantımızı koparacak bir ayin gerçekleştirebilirim. Hanemin atalarını, Orsellioların geleceğine Rota Reislerine hizmet etmesi için muhafaza edecekleri Atlasıma taşıyabilirim. Atlas'ın içindeki kadim irfan sayesinde Orsellio Hanesi, yeniden hakikat yoluna dönebilir. Bu sayede de gelecek nesiller, atalarının felaketle sonuçlanan hatalarını tekrarlamaz."
languages.original_text: "I witnessed the Atlas's creation through Tisiphone's eyes. I watched it happen through the memories of the Setthala clan. I... can create a ritual that will sever our connection to the Aeldari artefact. I can move the House's ancestors to my Atlas, the only one that the Orsellios will keep so it may serve future Novators. The ancient wisdom within the Atlas will help steer House Orsellio onto the path of truth. And allow future generations to avoid the calamitous pitfalls of the past."

traits.locale_text: "Atlas'ın yaratılışına Tisiphone'nin gözleriyle tanık oldum. Setthala klanının anılarında bunu seyrettim. Aeldari eseriyle olan bağlantımızı koparacak bir ayin gerçekleştirebilirim. Hanemin atalarını kendi Atlasıma taşıyabilirim. Orselliolar, geleceğin Rota Reislerine hizmet etmesi için sadece benim Atlasımı muhafaza eder. Atlas'ın içindeki kadim bilgelik sayesinde Orsellio Hanesi, yeniden hakikat yoluna dönebilir. Bu sayede de gelecek nesiller, atalarının felaket getiren hatalarını tekrarlamaz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
